Levels.imageDescription: He/She is a character from anime entitled "One Piece". The story follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy, a boy whose body gained the properties of rubber after unintentionally eating a Devil Fruit - Wikipedia. MAL score: 8.53

Levels.imageText: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Gintama". MAL score: 8.96
Levels.imageDescription: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Gintama". Set in Edo, which has been conquered by aliens named Amanto, the plot follows life from the point of view of samurai Gintoki Sakata, who works as a freelancer alongside his friends Shinpachi Shimura and Kagura in order to pay the monthly rent - Wikipedia. MAL score: 8.96

Levels.imageText: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Death Note". MAL score: 8.63
Levels.imageDescription: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Death Note". The story follows Light Yagami, a teen genius who discovers a mysterious notebook: the "Death Note", which belonged to the Shinigami Ryuk, and grants the user the supernatural ability to kill anyone whose name is written in its pages - Wikipedia. MAL score: 8.63

Levels.imageText: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Hunter X Hunter". MAL score: 8.41
Levels.imageDescription: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Hunter X Hunter". The story focuses on a young boy named Gon Freecss who discovers that his father, who left him at a young age, is actually a world renowned Hunter, a licensed professional who specializes in fantastical pursuits such as locating rare or unidentified animal species, etc - Wikipedia. MAL score: 8.41

Levels.imageText: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Fullmetal Alchemist". MAL score: 8.15
Levels.imageDescription: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Fullmetal Alchemist".  the series follows the journey of two alchemist brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, who are searching for the philosopher's stone to restore their bodies after a failed attempt to bring their mother back to life using alchemy - Wikipedia. MAL score: 8.15

Levels.imageText: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Code Geass". MAL score: 8.71
Levels.imageDescription: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Code Geass". the series follows the exiled prince Lelouch vi Britannia, who obtains the "power of absolute obedience" from a mysterious woman named C.C. Using this supernatural power, known as Geass, he leads a rebellion against the rule of the Holy Britannian Empire - Wikipedia. MAL score: 8.71

Levels.imageText: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Steins;Gate". MAL score: 9.11
Levels.imageDescription: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Steins;Gate". It is set in 2010, and follows Rintaro Okabe, who together with his friends accidentally discovers a method of time travel through which they can send text messages to the past, thereby changing the present - Wikipedia. MAL score: 9.11

Levels.imageText: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Re:Zero". MAL score: 8.28
Levels.imageDescription: He/She is a character from anime entitled "Re:Zero". Subaru Natsuki is a NEET who is suddenly summoned to a fantasy-like world. gameItems.value: Get ready to solve some picture puzzles! Get stucked? Use different hints! Earn coins by completing tasks or by watching short AD! Have fun!
If you liked the game, please rate it on Google Play!
Allow AD networks too use collected data and show personalized advertisements
Looks like you have a better progress!
Do you want to load it?
Hello there! Just to let you know, we use your gameplay and device data with your consent to improve our game!
Do you want us to present you relevant advertising that fits your interests?
Please, help me to complete the level!
Use hints if you get stucked!
Tap the letter to clear it. Swipe to clear all the letters.
Scrape the film to reveal the image!
Tap this to make the image more clear. Requires gold!
Tap the image to make it more clear. Requires gold!
Tap this to start aiming. Tap in second time to shoot. Requires gold!
Tap the area to start aiming. Tap in second time to shoot. Requires gold!
Tap to get info on where the character come from!
How difficult this task is? Make a right bet!
